00034 /*
00035  * $Log$
00036  * Revision 1.2  2008/08/11 06:59:18  haraldkipp
00037  * BSD types replaced by stdint types (feature request #1282721).
00038  *
00039  * Revision 1.1  2006/05/25 09:13:23  haraldkipp
00040  * Platform independent watchdog API added.
00041  *
00042  */
00043 
00044 #if defined(__GNUC__)
00045 #include <avr/wdt.h>
00046 #endif
00047 #include <sys/timer.h>
00048 #include <dev/watchdog.h>
00049 
00054 
00058 #ifndef NUT_WDT_FREQ
00059 #define NUT_WDT_FREQ    1165000
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 static ureg_t nested;
00063 static uint8_t wdt_div;
00064 
00065 
00076 uint32_t AvrWatchDogStart(uint32_t ms)
00077 {
00078     uint32_t ticks;
00079 
00080     wdt_reset();
00081 
00082     ticks = ((NUT_WDT_FREQ / 1000UL) * ms) >> 14;
00083     for (wdt_div = 0; wdt_div < 7 && ticks; wdt_div++) {
00084         ticks >>= 1;
00085     }
00086     wdt_enable(wdt_div);
00087     
00088     nested = 1;
00089 
00090     return (16384UL << wdt_div) / (NUT_WDT_FREQ / 1000UL);
00091 }
00092 
00099 void AvrWatchDogRestart(void)
00100 {
00101     wdt_reset();
00102 }
00103 
00110 void AvrWatchDogDisable(void)
00111 {
00112     if (nested) {
00113         nested++;
00114     }
00115     wdt_disable();
00116 }
00117 
00124 void AvrWatchDogEnable(void)
00125 {
00126     if (nested > 1 && --nested == 1) {
00127         wdt_enable(wdt_div);
00128     }
00129 }
